games

Class ReactionGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.Game
      • games.ReactionGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class ReactionGame
extends Game
implements java.util.Observer
    Implements Reaction timing game - Whack a mole-like game
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion
